title: x86_64-unknown-linux-musl: bad linker for target and unknown __fprintf_chk symbol

labels.name: A-linkage
labels.description: Area: linking into static, shared libraries and binaries

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

labels.name: T-infra
labels.description: Relevant to the infrastructure team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm trying to build a static musl target from source. I'm using the source release for 1.38.0. Here's the build config for `x.py`:

```
configure: build.rustc          := /nix/store/31dk8a6ai75pgf19irr360qakqcx898m-ru ...
configure: build.cargo          := /nix/store/w3prpvk1rmw24lhci2kpc0xn9rmzf7zm-ca ...
configure: target.x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.cc := /nix/store/7hzmz83nv8khpwsk858ya ...
configure: target.x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.linker := /nix/store/7hzmz83nv8khpwsk8 ...
configure: target.x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.cxx := /nix/store/7hzmz83nv8khpwsk858y ...
configure: target.x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.cc := /nix/store/zmdk6x8hr6z71b4rraxw ...
configure: target.x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.linker := /nix/store/zmdk6x8hr6z71b4r ...
configure: target.x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.cxx := /nix/store/zmdk6x8hr6z71b4rrax ...
configure: target.x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.musl-root := /nix/store/bzv12sjph1yq4 ...
configure: build.vendor         := True
configure: build.target         := ['x86_64-unknown-linux-musl']
configure: rust.channel         := stable
configure: rust.rpath           := True
configure: build.host           := ['x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu']
configure: build.profiler       := True
configure: install.prefix       := /nix/store/l2040i0s6w5475bqcdhzrmrnxfsdwsgd-ru ...
configure: build.build          := x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
configure: build.configure-args := ['--prefix=/nix/store/l2040i0s6w5475bqcdhzrmrn ...
```

the output is a bit verbose but basically `build` and `host` are `x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu` and `target` is `x86_64-unknown-linux-musl`. The generated `rustc` cannot link a simple main.rs (`fn main() {}`):

```
$ /nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/bin/rustc --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl ./main.rs
error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1
  |
  = note: "cc" "-Wl,--as-needed" "-Wl,-z,noexecstack" "-Wl,--eh-frame-hdr" "-m64" "-nostdlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/crt1.o" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/crti.o" "-L" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib" "main.main.7rcbfp3g-cgu.0.rcgu.o" "main.main.7rcbfp3g-cgu.1.rcgu.o" "main.main.7rcbfp3g-cgu.2.rcgu.o" "main.main.7rcbfp3g-cgu.3.rcgu.o" "main.main.7rcbfp3g-cgu.4.rcgu.o" "-o" "main" "main.4s37gsrti678ik8u.rcgu.o" "-Wl,--gc-sections" "-no-pie" "-Wl,-zrelro" "-Wl,-znow" "-nodefaultlibs" "-L" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib" "-Wl,-Bstatic" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libstd-71c4eb8a1adb2550.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libpanic_unwind-6a4ff357e5343afd.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libbacktrace-28a3e03cac394985.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libbacktrace_sys-a4bb9dfad4732c8d.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/librustc_demangle-4c483fa88b921ff7.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libhashbrown-a8b7c4a49a380d20.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/librustc_std_workspace_alloc-81687fbf0535072b.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libunwind-1446d9cfde137824.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libcfg_if-7b86ebd87e560da4.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/liblibc-ad748e87f989e78c.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/liballoc-bf28639c4730ce50.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/librustc_std_workspace_core-892c667e4edd14c9.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libcore-f5b4b6eecd8726ee.rlib" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libcompiler_builtins-19968047c669d8be.rlib" "-static" "-Wl,-Bdynamic" "/nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/crtn.o"
  = note: /nix/store/cl1i6bfqnx48ipakj4px7pb1babzs23j-binutils-2.31.1/bin/ld: /nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libunwind-1446d9cfde137824.rlib(UnwindLevel1.c.o): in function `unwind_phase2_forced':
          (.text+0x134): undefined reference to `__fprintf_chk'
          /nix/store/cl1i6bfqnx48ipakj4px7pb1babzs23j-binutils-2.31.1/bin/ld: (.text+0x1cf): undefined reference to `__fprintf_chk'
          /nix/store/cl1i6bfqnx48ipakj4px7pb1babzs23j-binutils-2.31.1/bin/ld: (.text+0x203): undefined reference to `__fprintf_chk'
          /nix/store/cl1i6bfqnx48ipakj4px7pb1babzs23j-binutils-2.31.1/bin/ld: (.text+0x280): undefined reference to `__fprintf_chk'
          /nix/store/cl1i6bfqnx48ipakj4px7pb1babzs23j-binutils-2.31.1/bin/ld: (.text+0x2bc): undefined reference to `__fprintf_chk'
          /nix/store/cl1i6bfqnx48ipakj4px7pb1babzs23j-binutils-2.31.1/bin/ld: /nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libunwind-1446d9cfde137824.rlib(UnwindLevel1.c.o):(.text+0x2ff): more undefined references to `__fprintf_chk' follow
          collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status


error: aborting due to previous error
```

The first odd thing is that the `linker` is _not_ the one I passed as a `target....-musl.linker`; I have to set `-C linker=...` manually to get the correct linker. That however is not enough to fix the issue, `libunwind.rlib` (in the `x86_64-unknown-linux-musl` ruststd target) still has unknown symbols to `__fprintf_chk` (which is not provided by `musl`):

```
$ nm -u /nix/store/igc120gdnz0rch6vqw2b1iw9nrxm5a4f-rustc-1.38.0/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libunwind-1446d9cfde137824.rlib 2> /dev/null  | grep 'fprintf'
                 U __fprintf_chk
                 U __fprintf_chk
                 U __fprintf_chk
```

(I _believe_ the build uses the bundled llvm's libunwind)

What I find odd is that the (binary) releases of rust 1.38.0 (and 1.37.0) do not seem to need `__fprintf_chk`:

```
$ nm -u /run/user/1015/tmp.E9OgRHUwSu/rust-1.38.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/rust-std-x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/lib/libunwind-733035d7b63c7282.rlib | grep fprin
nm: rust.metadata.bin: file format not recognized
nm: unwind-733035d7b63c7282.unwind.63kn7gkn-cgu.0.rcgu.bc.z: file format not recognized
                 U fprintf
                 U fprintf
                 U fprintf
```

Could you share the `config.toml` that you use to produce the binary releases? I couldn't figure out where they're being generated.
